author: Brad Mielke
title: 'This is not a game': Wife warns after husband dies from coronavirus
description: Erika Cave-Miller's husband died just days after being diagnosed.
content:
Erika Cave-Miller is heartbroken.
She's in mourning because her husband died of novel coronavirus just before his 45th birthday. She's bewildered, because he was diagnosed with pneumonia, then with coronavirus, then placed on a ventilator, then dead, all wit… [+4558 chars]
